snippet: President Pierre Nkurunziza announced on Wednesday that parliamentary and local elections scheduled for May 26 would be postponed until June 5.
abstract: Pres Pierre Nkurunziza of Burundi announces postponement of parliamentary and local elections, but delay may not quell rampant protests against his decision to seek third term.
lead_paragraph: President Pierre Nkurunziza announced on Wednesday that parliamentary and local elections scheduled for May 26 would be postponed until June 5.
